item.title: Landmarks Preservation Board to consider nomination of Licton Springs Park for landmark status
item.description:
Seattle’s Landmarks Preservation Board will consider the nomination of Licton Springs Park (9536 Ashworth Avenue North) on Wednesday, September 4 at 3:30 p.m. The meeting will be held in Seattle City Hall (600 4th Avenue, Floor L2) in the Boards & Commissions Room L2-80.

The public is invited …
item.dc:creator: amandacrosley
